system.availability: [Addictive] For 3d10 Minutes add +30 to any Willpower Tests, ignore Fatigue, and cannot be Pinned or Stunned. Afterwards make -20 Toughness Test or fall unconcious for 1d5 Hours
system.cost: Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -10 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.
